thread.title_full: WSO NYC Summer Happy Hour - Fri Aug 14th, 8pm - Galway Pub

author: AndyLouis
title: WSO NYC Summer Happy Hour - Fri Aug 14th, 8pm - Galway Pub
text:
on 8/13/15 at 7:38pm WSO NYC Summer Meet Up 
Thanks to @In The Flesh for helping me plan this and for getting the discussion going in this thread: SPECIAL WSO Happy Hour: The Re-Return of AndyLouis . 
I'm excited to be in NYC (the best city in the world?!) all next week and Friday August 14th I'll be hosting a WSO meet up for all 21+ to join in. 
I look forward to meet in person all those that I've talked to via the site, and of course a chance to see again all those whom I've met before. DON'T MISS OUT! 
Who: Any member of WSO + feel free to bring friends as the space we have can hold 50+ people. What: Informal meet up of the WSO monkey contingent. The NYC meet ups regularly get a group of 25+ people, the majority of which are professionals. I hope this one will double in attendance! Where: Galway Hooker Pub, back billiards room, http://galwaypubnyc.com , 7 E 36th Street, between 5th and Madison How to find the group: Mention "WSO" or "WallStreetOasis" at the door and they'll direct you to where we are located. When: Fri Aug 14th, 8pm - 11pm (or later if people are sticking around) 
FAQ 's: Networking? Keep it informal, e.g. don't go around passing out your business card nor your resume :-) Dress? Some will be coming after work, some will be in jeans. 3 piece suits highly encouraged. Drinking? Definitely Cover charge? None. Unfortunately it's not open bar though so bring your Sapphire card. What if I show up late? No worries, we'll be there till at least 11pm How do I contact you? Any questions email me [email protected] , phone# 206-886-8599
